title: ... Admits Ireda's insolvency petition against Shri Saikrupa Sugar
description: NCLT ordered management transfer to IRP/RP for Shri Saikrupa Sugar during CIRP. Ireda sanctioned a loan of Rs 121 crore in 2012, leading to the insolvency resolution process.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
